summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Brandon Street, from Empire Way to 28th Avenue South, by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10499 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
